captureBeforeAction.title: Capture before action
captureBeforeAction.description: Amount of time to capture the screen before doing any action like scrolling down or clicking.

scrollPercentage.title: Scroll percentage
scrollPercentage.description:
Amount to scroll down determined as a percentage of the vierport height.

For example, if viewport height is 1000 pixels and scroll percentage is set to 10%.
Then scroll down by 10% of viewport height: 1000 px = 100 px

waitToLoadPage.title: Wait to load
waitToLoadPage.description:
Set time to wait in the beginning so that page is fully loaded.
For example when there is loading bar in the beginning that you don't want in the recording.

acceptCookieSelector.title: Accept cookie selector
acceptCookieSelector.description: CSS selector for the cookie pop-up that will be used to click it away. For more info on CSS selectors click here

slowDownAnimations.title: Slow down animations
slowDownAnimations.description: When selected it slows down animations on the page so they can be properly captured.

lossyCompression.title: Lossy
lossyCompression.description: Lossy LZW compression of GIF using the Giflossy library (part of Gifsicle now).
lossyCompression.groupDescription:
Compression of the GIF file to a smaller size.

Will output a file for each method selected and the original gif will also always be saved.

loslessCompression.title: Losless
loslessCompression.description: Losless compression of GIF using the Gifsicle library.
